reviewText: This dvd is in the European version, so will not play on our equipment. This detail was not apparent on the order page. It was a realy disappointment.

Make no mistake, Night Bombers is no history channel hack job. It is a creation of superb craftsmanship that will satisfy and wow even the most discriminating student of war time history. I have searched for this for years and am surprised it isn't more widely known. A must see and own!
